Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1123.jpg'}
{3: 'Then, Ishmael uses the time travel terminal to contact other travelers.'}
{3: 'Finally, someone finally answers Ishmael after a long wait.'}
{2: '??', 3: "This is Si. I've received your message.", 18: '100006541'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "This is Ishmael. We're on Andymion, and our coordinates are...", 4: '1', 18: '100006542'}
{3: 'The person she is talking to pauses with surprise, then chuckles.'}
{2: 'Si, Time Traveler', 3: "You're still alive?", 18: '100006544'}
{2: 'Si, Time Traveler', 3: 'Do you have anyone else with you?', 18: '100006546'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: '"Gray Raven" is here with me.', 4: '1', 18: '100006547'}
{2: 'Si, Time Traveler', 3: 'I see... Cough... cough!', 18: '100006548'}
{3: 'You feel a wave of unease.'}
{2: 'Si, Time Traveler', 3: "Don't worry about me.", 18: '100006550'}
{2: 'Si, Time Traveler', 3: 'When I escaped "Shrike", I grabbed some files from the time mainframe—early research. I thought we could rebuild "Shrike" later.', 18: '100006551'}
{2: 'Si, Time Traveler', 3: "Let's meet at Andymion. I'll give you the data then.", 18: '100006552'}
{3: 'After you agree on where to meet, you ask Si a question.'}
{2: 'Si, Time Traveler', 3: 'Ta mentioned you to me at the time mainframe.', 18: '100006553'}
{3: 'You hold back your questions. You can ask him more later.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{1: 'Andymion', 2: 'Two days later'}
{3: 'Ishmael and you walk deep into the forest.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The rendezvous point is just ahead.', 4: '1', 18: '100006554'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{3: 'After pushing through the thick forest, you arrive at a clearing.'}
{3: 'A spaceship sits quietly, sunlight filtering through the leaves and dancing on it.'}
{2: "Something's not right.", 3: '43'}
{3: 'The ship is covered in vines and moss.'}
{3: "Through the window of the cockpit, you see a time traveler in the pilot's seat—"}
{3: 'He has been dead for a long time.'}
{3: 'Ishmael and you step forward to take a closer look.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'At least a standard year has passed.', 4: '1', 18: '100006555'}
{2: 'A piercing wound has gone through his abdomen and reached his spine.', 3: '51'}
{3: 'A storage device and letter rest beside Si, and he is holding a photo.'}
{3: 'Ishmael picks up the letter. It is a short message.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: "I got your message, but it's from a year in my future.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 5: '100006556', 6: '1'}
{1: "I'm sorry, but this is where I stop.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 5: '100006557', 6: '1'}
{1: 'I hope the data helps.', 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 5: '100006558', 6: '1'}
{1: "It's up to you now, Ishmael.", 2: '000000ff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory968.png', 5: '100006559', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg', 3: '1', 4: '0', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory539.jpg'}
{3: 'Ishmael finishes the letter, folds it, and puts it away.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'May your soul soar with the Four-Winged White Raven.', 4: '1', 18: '100006560'}
{3: "She looks silently at Si's body."}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "He would tell anyone who'd listen how adorable his kid was.", 4: '1', 18: '100006562'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'He always brought back desserts he and his wife made after every vacation to share with us.', 4: '1', 18: '100006563'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I saw their family photo—they were a really happy family...', 4: '1', 18: '100006564'}
{3: 'She smiles a little, her voice determined.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "You don't have to comfort me.", 4: '1', 18: '100006565'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Let's go. We need to find Ta in this time period.", 4: '1', 18: '100006566'}
{3: 'The light and shadows remain unchanged among the trees where Si rests still.'}
{3: "Seeing his face, you still can't shake the doubt."}
{3: 'Was Si at the time mainframe too?'}
{3: "That quick look in the past wasn't enough for you to remember everyone, and with Si's passing, you will never know."}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory903.jpg'}
{1: 'Andymion', 2: 'One week later'}
{3: 'Andymion, one week later'}
{2: 'Do we just leave the files here?', 3: '90'}
{1: '1', 3: 'The two of you hide in the shadows, watching the young Ta·3T-class go into her room.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Yes. I've left enough information. It's all explained clearly.", 4: '1', 18: '100006567'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Si's data was surprisingly thorough. I didn't think he could get that much out so fast.", 4: '1', 18: '100006568'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'If Ta follows our instructions, "Shrike" will be built somewhere else.', 4: '1', 18: '100006569'}
{2: 'So now we just wait.', 3: '100'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Meanwhile, we can do other things too. We've got 40 years after all.", 4: '1', 18: '100006571'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'We just need to check on Ta every so often.', 4: '1', 18: '100006572'}
{2: 'Is this what time travelers do?', 3: '107'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Not exactly. "Shrike" has learned a lot, and we\'ll try different ways to stop the "Terminus Year".', 4: '1', 18: '100006573'}
{2: 'Where will we go after this?', 3: '109'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "I've never done a 40-year mission before, so I don't know how much this will change things.", 4: '1', 18: '100006575'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab', 2: '2'}
{2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiHuaping.prefab'}
{3: 'Before Ishmael can finish, everything goes blurry in your view for a second, then clears up.'}
{3: 'Beep—beep—'}
{3: 'You hear a faint signal coming from somewhere on you.'}
{2: "It's the time travel terminal.", 3: '128'}
{3: 'Ishmael pulls out the terminal, her face lit up.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The time mainframe\'s back. "Shrike" is already rebuilt in the future.', 4: '1', 18: '100006578'}
{2: '...Just like that?', 3: '139'}
{3: 'Ishmael frowns too, looking confused.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'It was a little fast indeed.', 4: '1', 18: '100006579'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Changing history is usually not easy.', 4: '1', 18: '100006580'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I thought it would take years of changes before we would receive signals from the future mainframe.', 4: '1', 18: '100006581'}
{3: 'Ishmael thinks for a moment, then shares her theory.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Maybe "Shrike" is always likely to happen.', 4: '1', 18: '100006582'}
{3: 'The matter seems settled, but you are still suspicious. It feels too easy.'}
{2: 'If we can go back as long as there is a time mainframe in the future...', 3: '143'}
{2: 'It must have existed for a while before it was destroyed.', 3: '144'}
{2: "Why couldn't we connect to the mainframe before?", 3: '145'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Because "Shrike" is actually "outside of time".', 4: '1', 18: '100006583'}
{2: '"Outside of time"?'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'To see how reality changed, "Shrike" was "anchored" to a fixed year when it was built.', 4: '1', 18: '100006584'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "If time's a line of points, each moving forward...", 4: '1', 18: '100006585'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Then "Shrike" is a point that stays still.', 4: '1', 18: '100006586'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: '"Shrike" exists alongside real-time, but is hidden from it.', 4: '1', 18: '100006587'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Time travelers come straight back to "Shrike" after missions to minimize the impacts of changes to history.', 4: '1', 18: '100006588'}
{2: "What if we don't get back in time?", 3: '154'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'It depends on how much reality has changed.', 4: '1', 18: '100006589'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I once saw a record about a time traveler who changed reality substantially but didn\'t get back to "Shrike" in time.', 4: '1', 18: '100006590'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'The changes messed with him, and he lost his memories.', 4: '1', 18: '100006591'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'He used to be a geographer before joining "Shrike".', 4: '1', 18: '100006592'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'After reality changed, he became a painter.', 4: '1', 18: '100006593'}
{2: "Time, it's really something.", 3: '163'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Amazing, but dangerous too.', 4: '1', 18: '100006594'}
{3: 'Ishmael holds out her hand.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Take my hand. We should go back now.', 4: '1', 18: '100006595'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStory/FxUiZhuanchangBaiEnd.prefab', 2: '3'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory00.png'}
{3: 'You hold hands tightly as the terminal activates, and blue light surrounds you again.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1131.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUiFight/FxUiMohuTest.prefab'}
{1: '"Shrike" Research Institute'}
{3: '"Shrike" Research Institute.'}
{3: 'With a familiar dizzy feeling, the scene transforms.'}
{3: 'You are standing on a white hexagonal platform, surrounded by mechanical arms, with control consoles nearby. Staff members are still recording data in the distance.'}
{3: 'Everything looks the same, but you feel like you have been gone for a lifetime.'}
{3: 'Footsteps come closer.'}
{3: 'Ta·3T-class is looking at documents in her hands, only noticing you when she looks up.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Have you shown "Gray Raven" around "Shrike" yet?', 4: '2', 18: '100006597'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Seeing Ta·3T-class, Ishmael runs up to hug her.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Ta·3T-class stares at Ishmael, shocked, before realizing what happened.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'So. You two were the ones who left the data.', 4: '2', 18: '100006600'}
{3: 'When she hears about how the Punishers attacked "Shrike", Ta·3T-class looks troubled.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'I\'ll put countermeasures in place to strengthen "Shrike\'s" defenses.', 4: '2', 18: '100006601'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'But none of that matters as much as you being back safely.', 4: '2', 18: '100006602'}
{3: 'She looks relieved as she gazes at Ishmael.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "All that matters is you're alive.", 4: '2', 18: '100006603'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: '"Gray Raven", thanks for all you\'ve done for Ishmael.', 4: '2', 18: '100006604'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{3: 'After that, your team goes on mission after mission.'}
{3: 'You have seen worlds end.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory460.jpg'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1106.jpg'}
{3: 'You have also seen stars being born.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory334.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'That mission went smoothly.', 4: '18', 18: '100006606'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{3: 'You have narrowly escaped death over and over.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory440.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: '"Gray Raven", watch your back!', 4: '18', 18: '100006607'}
{3: 'You keep altering the course of history.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1132.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Things should improve from now on.', 4: '1', 18: '100006608'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png'}
{1: 'The whole civilization fights a brutal war against the Punishers and Substance-0.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The war is universe-consuming, yet the moments are lost like tears in the rain.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But some things cannot be changed.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'There are fewer and fewer time travelers.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'The Punishers seem to have found a way—many travelers on solo missions are killed.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: '"Shrike" starts to feel empty. The break room, once buzzing, is now eerily quiet.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}

{1: 'Sometimes people would talk about it, but they would quickly go quiet. Everyone knows things are not looking good.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Ishmael says she once saw someone hiding in a corner, crying and whispering the names of the dead.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'But time keeps going.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Until one day, "Shrike" is destroyed again.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory538.png', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1131.jpg'}
{3: 'It is supposed to be a normal day—until Ta and Si burst in.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'The Punishers are attacking "Shrike"! Where\'s Ishmael?!', 4: '1', 18: '100006609'}
{2: 'She should be at the archives in Area C. Follow me!', 3: '267'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg'}
{1: 'Everything happens like Ta said. Ten minutes later, the Punishers attack "Shrike" with the Corrupted.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: '"Shrike\'s" defenses do not last long against the Punishers.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'When you find Ishmael, she is surrounded by Corrupted.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'If you had arrived any later, Ishmael might not have made it.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'Ta holds the injured Ishmael, her voice shaking as she whispers, "I got here in time".', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'You have hardly ever seen Ta so emotional.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: 'With Ta and Si, Ishmael and you go back in time and change "Shrike\'s" coordinates.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg', 6: '1'}
{1: '"Shrike" is rebuilt, and everything goes back to normal.', 2: 'ffffffff', 4: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1125.jpg', 6: '1', 9: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1129.jpg'}
{3: 'Even though time has lost its meaning to time travelers, "Shrike" staff has created a standard system to measure time.'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1129.jpg'}
{3: 'Six standard months later.'}
{3: "Ishmael enters the break room and sees the one she's been looking for."}
{3: 'You are sitting in a chair with an empty plate to your right.'}
{3: 'A holographic screen floats above the plate, showing a news broadcast.'}
{3: 'Judging from the faint sound, it seems to be a news clip from the past.'}
{3: 'However, you are not watching the news but concentrating on carving something.'}
{2: '...Ishmael?!', 3: '292', 4: 'How did you find me here...', 5: '292'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Are you avoiding me? I've been looking everywhere for you.", 4: '1', 18: '100006611'}
{2: "No, of course not. It's just quieter in here.", 3: '295'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Got anything planned for tomorrow?', 4: '1', 18: '100006612'}
{2: "As long as it doesn't interfere with our mission the day after.", 3: '302'}
{3: 'Ishmael turns and walks away.'}
{3: "Before leaving, she looks back. She can't shake the feeling that something is being kept from her."}
{3: 'She spots you in the shadows, seemingly lost in thought.'}
{3: 'The news from the past plays on the screen, the sound echoing in the empty room.'}
{2: 'News Broadcast', 3: '"Supercomputer \'Silence\' is unveiled today. Its inventor, Blake, announces at the press conference... confirming a boundary extension forward."', 18: '100006615'}
{2: 'News Broadcast', 3: '"The Corrupted has attacked another planet..."', 18: '100006616'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory789.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '0.8'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory789.jpg'}
{2: 'News Broadcast', 3: '"Welcome to the Frontend Show. Our guest today is... Panpsychism is sparking a new round of debate..."', 18: '100006617'}
{2: 'News Broadcast', 3: '"Humans have a nature to attribute the unforeseen to chance, but there is no such thing as chance from the grand perspective of history..."', 18: '100006618'}
{2: 'News Broadcast', 3: '"Would it be fair to say that you agree with fatalism?"', 18: '100006619'}
{2: 'News Broadcast', 3: '"No, I do not agree with fatalism."', 18: '100006620'}
{3: 'Click—'}
{3: 'Someone has muted the playback device.'}
{2: "You're old-fashioned too. Ishmael also likes physical books.", 3: '323'}
{3: "Ta·3T-class's hands pause for a moment, and then she goes right back to work. She keeps her head down, still buried in the reports, her fingers flying across the old keyboard."}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "That friend... was Ishmael's old professor.", 4: '1', 18: '100006622'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Why are you here? I thought you would be with Ishmael.', 4: '1', 18: '100006623'}
{3: 'She gets right to the point, clearly wanting to work without interruption.'}
{3: 'Seeing her like that, you decide to get straight to the point too.'}
{2: 'The Punisher attack on "Shrike"... happened the day I arrived.', 3: '332'}
{3: 'She stops typing and sits up straight.'}
{2: 'On Andymion, Ishmael said the mainframe had never been destroyed.', 3: '334'}
{2: 'Is that really true?', 3: '335'}
{3: 'Ta·3T-class does not seem surprised, as if she has been waiting for this question.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "I figured you'd wait a little longer before asking me.", 4: '1', 18: '100006624'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'When did you start getting suspicious?', 4: '1', 18: '100006625'}
{2: 'When I met Si.', 3: '340'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'So, your first day at "Shrike". You\'re pretty sharp.', 4: '1', 18: '100006626'}
{2: 'It started with Si—the data he brought was too thorough.', 3: '344'}
{2: "It's like everything was planned out.", 3: '345'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory903.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: "Si's data was surprisingly thorough. I didn't think he could get that much out so fast.", 4: '1', 18: '100006568'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory324.png'}
{2: 'I checked the records later. Si never went to the mainframe.', 3: '355'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1123.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Si, Time Traveler', 3: 'Ta mentioned you to me at the time mainframe.', 4: '1', 18: '100006553'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory789.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'I contacted Si on my way to the time mainframe.', 4: '1', 18: '100006628'}
{2: 'It was incredible how fast "Shrike" was rebuilt.', 3: '365'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory903.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'It was a little fast indeed.', 4: '1', 18: '100006579'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Changing history is usually not easy.', 4: '1', 18: '100006580'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'I thought it would take years of changes before we would receive signals from the future mainframe.', 4: '1', 18: '100006581'}
{3: 'Ishmael thinks for a moment, then shares her theory.'}
{2: 'Ishmael', 3: 'Maybe "Shrike" is always likely to happen.', 4: '1', 18: '100006582'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory789.jpg'}
{2: "I'm guessing you had some backup plans.", 3: '380'}
{2: "Ishmael and I just took Si's place.", 3: '381'}
{2: 'You wouldn\'t know the name "Gray Raven" after the rebuild.', 3: '384'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1131.jpg'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Have you shown "Gray Raven" around "Shrike" yet?', 4: '1', 18: '100006597'}
{2: 'And you knew the Punishers were coming.', 3: '389'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory1131.jpg'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'The Punishers are attacking "Shrike"! Where\'s Ishmael?!', 4: '1', 18: '100006609'}
{2: "Putting it all together, it's clear.", 3: '397'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Effect/Prefab/FxUi/FxUiStoryNew/FxUiStoryWhiteNew.prefab', 2: '2'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory789.jpg'}
{3: 'Ta·3T-class is briefly at a loss for words.'}
{2: 'How did you know the Punishers were coming?', 3: '404'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'You must have your theories. Why not tell me?', 4: '1', 18: '100006631'}
{2: 'The supercomputer... "Silence"?', 3: '406'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'You got it, just like I expected.', 4: '1', 18: '100006632'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'The time mainframe needs "Silence" to run, and time is always a mystery.', 4: '1', 18: '100006633'}
{2: 'Very dangerous, too.', 3: '409'}
{3: 'Ta·3T-class ignores you.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'It\'s a safety feature. If the time mainframe goes down, "Silence" sends information back to the past.', 4: '1', 18: '100006634'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'But, the points in the past "Silence" sent information to are getting closer to the present.', 4: '1', 18: '100006635'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "At first, it sent info a day back. Now, it's only about ten minutes.", 4: '1', 18: '100006636'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'That means the Punishers are getting faster.', 4: '1', 18: '100006637'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Knowing this, do you still want to stay at "Shrike"?', 4: '1', 18: '100006638'}
{2: 'Honestly, I don\'t care how many times "Shrike" gets destroyed.', 3: '416'}
{3: 'Ta seems to have expected that response.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: '...Is it because of Ishmael?', 4: '1', 18: '100006639'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "To think you've learned this much...", 4: '1', 18: '100006640'}
{2: "There's still something I'm confused about.", 3: '421'}
{2: "You're really worried about whether Ishmael made it.", 3: '422'}
{2: 'Ishmael... has died multiple times?', 3: '423'}
{3: 'She leans back, her voice sounding helpless.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Every time the mainframe is destroyed, she dies soon after because of all sorts of events.', 4: '1', 18: '100006643'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "I don't get why. Maybe... it's her professor's fault.", 4: '1', 18: '100006644'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "I can't save her... It's a closed loop.", 4: '1', 18: '100006645'}
{3: '"...But there is no such thing as chance from the grand perspective of history..."'}
{3: 'The program you heard when you came in pops back into your head, and you feel a wave of absurdity.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "I've tried a lot of things.", 4: '1', 18: '100006647'}
{2: 'Like when you changed where Ishmael and I were going last time?', 3: '435'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Yes. That was one of the few times it worked.', 4: '1', 18: '100006648'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Ishmael\'s mission to the "Terminus Year" was another try.', 4: '1', 18: '100006649'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'She met you, and her mission was cut short.', 4: '1', 18: '100006650'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'The plan was that "Shrike" would get attacked when she went to the "Terminus Year", and she\'d be trapped there.', 4: '1', 18: '100006651'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'That\'s the message I got from "Silence" when I was in the corridor.', 4: '1', 18: '100006652'}
{3: 'You remember when you first got to "Shrike" and talked to Ishmael, everything went blurry before clearing up.'}
{3: 'It happened again when "Shrike" was rebuilt—maybe that is what it feels like when reality changes.'}
{3: 'She gestures toward the pile of reports.'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'I looked at the data from both times, and I suspected you were the reason why Ishmael survived.', 4: '1', 18: '100006653'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'I checked your background, and you know what I found?', 4: '1', 18: '100006654'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Nothing. Like you just appeared out of nowhere.', 4: '1', 18: '100006655'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'I don\'t know who you are, but I think you have the power to change this so-called "fate".', 4: '1', 18: '100006656'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "You've probably noticed the Punishers changed tactics recently—they're going after those who are alone.", 4: '1', 18: '100006657'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: '"Shrike" won\'t be able to be rebuilt forever.', 4: '1', 18: '100006658'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Before that, I want to try one last thing.', 4: '1', 18: '100006659'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: "I'm trying to improve the methods of time travel.", 4: '1', 18: '100006660'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'I want Ishmael to time travel without needing "Shrike".', 4: '1', 18: '100006661'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'Think of it as me building a personal time mainframe just for Ishmael.', 4: '1', 18: '100006662'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'No one will know where it is.', 4: '1', 18: '100006663'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'That way, I can separate Ishmael from "Shrike"—maybe that will set her free.', 4: '1', 18: '100006664'}
{2: 'Ta·3T-class', 3: 'I know this is selfish.', 4: '1', 18: '100006665'}
